text: Gaddis is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: * C. J. Gaddis (born 1985), footballer * Christian Gaddis (born 1984), footballer * Gadabout Gaddis (1896-1986), television fisherman * John Lewis Gaddis (born 1939), historian of the Cold War and grand strategy * Miranda Gaddis, American crime victim * Thomas E. Gaddis (1908–1984), American author * Vincent Gaddis, American author * William Gaddis (1922-1998), American novelist ==See also== * Gaddis Smith
title: Gaddis (surname)
